name: Clutch / Fold over clutch / Shibori clutch / Hand dyed clutch / Carry all pouch
description:
Fold over clutch, you can use it as a casual bag, for documentation, books or carry all you want. 
OOAK clutch, hand dyed with Shibori technique in blue and white and hand painted with gold fabric paint. Cool and fashionable gift!. Original clutch with an abstract pattern design.
You can use it folded or not, includes an interior pocket. Great capacity and versatile.


* Blue and white cotton
* Cotton lining 
* Blue zipper
* Interior pocket

::::Size::::
* Fold 9.5 in x 12.4 in (24 cm x 31.5 cm)
* Unfolded 14.5 in x 12.4 in (37 cm x 31.5 cm)

Please know that each hand-dyed item is unique and one-of-a-kind, but I often repeat similar styles and colors.
